name: personalizedreminder
0: ”Alexa, open personal reminder for remind me to charge mobile”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: personal reminder
des:
This reminder skill is a voice-activated assistant that allows users to set reminders for specific need of charging electric vehicle daily or at a specific one-time event, providing convenient and hands-free assistance in managing their daily trips. With this skill, users can easily create reminders for charging the battery ontime to have sufficent charge before a trip.

To use this reminder skill, users simply need to enable the skill and activate it by saying a voice command such as "Alexa, open personal reminder." The skill will then guide the user and a reminder will then be saved and set to alert the user at the designated time.

This reminder skills can be customized to fit the user's preferences, with options such as repeating reminders on a regular daily schedule or setting up reminders for one time event. Users can also manage their reminders through the Alexa app, where they can view, edit, or delete reminders as needed. The reminder will also pop-up a notification if user has the alexa app installed.

Overall, this reminder skill provides a convenient and hands-free way for users to manage their electric vehicle usage, ensuring that they never forget to charge the vehicle.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
